thread.title: These photos from Sunny Leone's Kashmir trip will give you the 'chills'
thread.title_full: These photos from Sunny Leone's Kashmir trip will give you the 'chills' - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: These photos from Sunny Leone's Kashmir trip will give you the 'chills'
text:
It was snowing so much the first night!! @dirrty99 @yusuf_911 @sunnyrajani 
A photo posted by Sunny Leone (@sunnyleone) onFeb 6, 2017 at 5:13am PST
 
Bollywood actress Sunny Leone and her husband Daniel Weber are currently enjoying the snow-clad mountains of Kashmir! The actress, who recently featured in Shah Rukh Khan's 'Raees' song 'Laila Main Laila', took to Instagram to share some stunning pictures! Take a look... 
  Doughnut tubing with @dirrty99 hehe so much fun! We crashed and flipped over into powder snow! Lol so funny! 
A photo posted by Sunny Leone (@sunnyleone) onFeb 6, 2017 at 5:18am PST
  Such a beautiful place! Feel so lucky to have come here! @tomasmoucka @dirrty99 @yusuf_911 @sunnyleone 
A photo posted by Sunny Leone (@sunnyleone) onFeb 6, 2017 at 1:23am PST
  Phew!!! So amazing! @dirrty99 
A video posted by Sunny Leone (@sunnyleone) onFeb 6, 2017 at 1:03am PST
